title: ISweepFeatureData.GetD2TwistAngle
description: Gets the twist angle in Direction 2 of this bidirectional sweep feature.
returns: Angle of twist in radians in Direction 2
remarks:
This property is valid only if:
ISweepFeatureData::TwistControlType
is set to
swTwistControlType_e
.swTwistControlConstantTwistAlongPath.
ISweepFeatureData::Direction
is set to
swSweepDirection_e
.swSweepBidirectional.
